text: Veronika Voss (, "The Longing of Veronika Voss") is a 1982 West German drama movie directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder and starring Rosel Zech, Hilmar Thate, Cornelia Froboess, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Annemarie Düringer, Peter Berling, Günther Kaufmann, Erik Schumann, Peter Zadek. ==Other websites== * * Category:1982 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Rainer Werner Fassbinder Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies set in Munich
title: Veronika Voss
